   22: -module(lasp_SUITE).
   23: -author("Christopher Meiklejohn <christopher.meiklejohn@gmail.com>").
   24: 
   25: %% common_test callbacks
   26: -export([%% suite/0,
   27:          init_per_suite/1,
   28:          end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2,
   30:          end_per_testcase/2,
   31:          all/0]).
   32: 
   33: %% tests
   34: -compile([export_all]).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   38: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   39: 
   40: %% ===================================================================
   41: %% common_test callbacks
   42: %% ===================================================================
   43: 
   44: init_per_suite(_Config) ->
   45:     %% Start Lasp on the runner and enable instrumentation.
   46:     lasp_support:start_runner(),
   47: 
   48:     _Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     %% Stop Lasp on the runner.
   52:     lasp_support:stop_runner(),
   53: 
   54:     _Config.
   55: 
   56: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   57:     ct:pal("Beginning case: ~p", [Case]),
   58: 
   59:     %% Runner must start and stop in between test runs as well, to
   60:     %% ensure that we clear the membership list (otherwise, we could
   61:     %% delete the data on disk, but this is cleaner.)
   62:     lasp_support:start_runner(),
   63: 
   64:     Nodes = lasp_support:start_nodes(Case, Config),
   65:     [{nodes, Nodes}|Config].
   66: 
   67: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   68:     ct:pal("Case finished: ~p", [Case]),
   69: 
   70:     lasp_support:stop_nodes(Case, Config),
   71: 
   72:     %% Runner must start and stop in between test runs as well, to
   73:     %% ensure that we clear the membership list (otherwise, we could
   74:     %% delete the data on disk, but this is cleaner.)
   75:     lasp_support:stop_runner().
   76: 
   77: all() ->
   78:     [
   79:      contracted_latency_test,
   80:      uncontracted_latency_test,
   81:      latency_with_reads_test,
   82:      sql_parser_test,
   83:      sql_combined_view_test,
   84:      sql_simple_contracted_latency_test,
   85:      sql_simple_uncontracted_latency_test,
   86:      sql_join_contracted_latency_test,
   87:      sql_join_uncontracted_latency_test,
   88:      stream_test,
   89:      query_test,
   90: 	 transaction_test,
   91:      ivar_test,
   92:      orset_test,
   93:      awset_ps_test,
   94:      dynamic_ivar_test,
   95:      monotonic_read_test,
   96:      map_test,
   97:      filter_test,
   98:      union_test,
   99:      product_test,
  100:      intersection_test,
  101:      membership_test,
  102:      enforce_once_test
  103:     ].
  104: 
  105: -include("lasp.hrl").
  106: 
  107: %% ===================================================================
  108: %% tests
  109: %% ===================================================================
  110: 
  111: -define(AWSET_PS, awset_ps).
  112: -define(COUNTER, pncounter).
  113: -define(LATENCY_ITERATIONS, 2200).
  114: -define(TRIM, {trim, 100, 100}).
  115: 
  116: -define(ID, <<"myidentifier">>).
  117: 
  118: contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  119:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  120:         true ->
  121:             Res = latency_test_case(5, contraction, no_read, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  122:             write_csv(path_contraction, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  123: 
  124:         _ -> ok
  125:     end.
  126: 
  127: uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  128:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  129:         true ->
  130:             Res = latency_test_case(5, no_contraction, no_read, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  131:             write_csv(path_contraction, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  132: 
  133:         _ -> ok
  134:     end.
  135: 
  136: latency_with_reads_test(_Config) ->
  137:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  138:         true ->
  139:             Res = latency_test_case(5, contraction, random_reads, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  140:             write_csv(path_contraction, contraction_with_reads, Res, ?TRIM);
  141: 
  142:         _ -> ok
  143:     end.
  144: 
  145: sql_parser_test(_Config) ->
  146:     ok = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_table_with_values(users, [
  147:         [{name, "Foo"}, {age, 22}],
  148:         [{name, "Bar"}, {age, 9}],
  149:         [{name, "Baz"}, {age, 20}]
  150:     ]),
  151: 
  152:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20], ["Bar", 9], ["Foo", 22]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(users, [name, age])),
  153: 
  154:     {ok, Id1} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age = 22 or age < 10"),
  155: 
  156:     %% Stabilize
  157:     timer:sleep(100),
  158: 
  159:     ?assertMatch([["Bar"], ["Foo"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id1, [name])),
  160: 
  161:     {ok, Id2} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age <= 22 and age => 10"),
  162: 
  163:     %% Stabilize
  164:     timer:sleep(100),
  165: 
  166:     ?assertMatch([["Baz"], ["Foo"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id2, [name])),
  167: 
  168:     {ok, Id3} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age < 22 and age > 19"),
  169: 
  170:     %% Stabilize
  171:     timer:sleep(100),
  172: 
  173:     ?assertMatch([["Baz"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id3, [name])),
  174: 
  175:     {ok, Id4} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name, age from users where age < 22 and age > 19"),
  176: 
  177:     %% Stabilize
  178:     timer:sleep(100),
  179: 
  180:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id4, [name, age])),
  181: 
  182:     {ok, Id5} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name, age from users where name = 'Foo' or name = 'Baz'"),
  183: 
  184:     %% Stabilize
  185:     timer:sleep(100),
  186: 
  187:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20], ["Foo", 22]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id5, [name, age])),
  188: 
  189:     ok.
  190: 
  191: sql_combined_view_test(_Config) ->
  192:     ok = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_table_with_values(classics, [
  193:         [{title, "Breathless"}, {year, 1960}, {rating, 80}],
  194:         [{title, "A Woman Is a Woman"}, {year, 1961}, {rating, 76}],
  195:         [{title, "Masculin Feminin"}, {year, 1966}, {rating, 77}],
  196:         [{title, "La Chinoise"}, {year, 1967}, {rating, 73}]
  197:     ]),
  198: 
  199:     {OutputId, Type}=Output = lasp_sql_materialized_view:generate_identifier(filtered),
  200:     %% have to declare the value explicitly, otherwise query will fail on write
  201:     lasp:declare(OutputId, Type),
  202:     {ok, Id1} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Output,
  203:                                                   "select title, rating from classics where year => 1960 and year <= 1965"),
  204: 
  205:     %% Stabilize
  206:     timer:sleep(100),
  207: 
  208:     ?assertMatch([["A Woman Is a Woman"], ["Breathless"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id1, [title])),
  209: 
  210:     {ok, Id2} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select title from filtered where rating => 80"),
  211: 
  212:     %% Stabilize
  213:     timer:sleep(100),
  214: 
  215:     ?assertMatch([["Breathless"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id2, [title])),
  216: 
  217:     ok.
  218: 
  219: latency_test_case(NVertices, Optimization, RandomReadsConfig, Iterations) ->
  220:     Ids = generate_path(NVertices, ?COUNTER),
  221:     case Optimization of
  222:         no_contraction ->
  223:             %% Disable automatic contraction
  224:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, false),
  225:             %% Force a full cleaving before starting the test
  226:             lasp_dependence_dag:cleave_all();
  227:         _ ->
  228:             %% Enable automatic contraction
  229:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, true),
  230:             %% Force a contraction before starting the test
  231:             lasp_dependence_dag:contract()
  232:     end,
  233:     First = lists:nth(1, Ids),
  234:     Intermediate = case RandomReadsConfig of
  235:         random_reads ->
  236:             lists:sublist(Ids, 2, length(Ids) - 2);
  237:         _ -> []
  238:     end,
  239:     Last = lists:last(Ids),
  240:     latency_run_case(Iterations, [], RandomReadsConfig,
  241:                      First, Intermediate, Last, increment, undefined).
  242: 
  243: latency_run_case(0, Acc, _, _, _, _, _, _) -> lists:reverse(Acc);
  244: latency_run_case(Iterations, Acc, RandomReadsConfig,
  245:                  From, Intermediate, To, Mutator, Threshold0) ->
  246: 
  247:     Threshold = {strict, Threshold0},
  248:     MutateAndRead = fun(Src, Dst, Mutation, Thr) ->
  249:         lasp:update(Src, Mutation, a),
  250:         lasp:read(Dst, Thr)
  251:     end,
  252:     case RandomReadsConfig of
  253:         no_read -> ok;
  254:         random_reads ->
  255:             %% Read from a random intermediate vertex every 10 iterations
  256:             case (Iterations rem 10) =:= 0 of
  257:                 true ->
  258:                     RPos = lasp_support:puniform(length(Intermediate)),
  259:                     RandomChoice = lists:nth(RPos, Intermediate),
  260:                     lasp:read(RandomChoice, undefined);
  261:                 _ -> ok
  262:             end
  263:     end,
  264:     {Time, {ok, {_, _, _, NewThreshold}}} = timer:tc(MutateAndRead, [From, To, Mutator, Threshold]),
  265: 
  266:     latency_run_case(Iterations - 1, [Time | Acc], RandomReadsConfig,
  267:                      From, Intermediate, To, Mutator, NewThreshold).
  268: 
  269: 
  270: sql_simple_contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  271:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  272:         true ->
  273:             %% Topology.
  274:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  275:             Middle = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(middle),
  276:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  277: 
  278:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Middle,
  279:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0"),
  280: 
  281:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  282:                                                         "select b, c from middle where b = 'foo'"),
  283: 
  284:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  285: 
  286:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  287:             write_csv(sql_simple_queries, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  288: 
  289:         _ -> ok
  290:     end.
  291: 
  292: sql_simple_uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  293:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  294:         true ->
  295:             %% Topology.
  296:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  297:             Middle = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(middle),
  298:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  299: 
  300:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Middle,
  301:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0"),
  302: 
  303:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  304:                                                         "select b, c from middle where b = 'foo'"),
  305: 
  306:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  307: 
  308:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(no_contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  309:             write_csv(sql_simple_queries, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  310: 
  311:         _ -> ok
  312:     end.
  313: 
  314: sql_join_contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  315:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  316:         true ->
  317:             %% Topology.
  318:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  319:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  320:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  321:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0 and b = 'foo'"),
  322: 
  323:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  324: 
  325:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  326:             write_csv(sql_join_queries, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  327: 
  328:         _ -> ok
  329:     end.
  330: 
  331: sql_join_uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  332:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  333:         true ->
  334:             %% Topology.
  335:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  336:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  337:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  338:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0 and b = 'foo'"),
  339: 
  340:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  341: 
  342:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(no_contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  343:             write_csv(sql_join_queries, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  344: 
  345:         _ -> ok
  346:     end.
  347: 
  348: generate_path(N, Type) ->
  349:     [_|Tail]=Ids = lists:map(fun(_) ->
  350:         {ok, {Id, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(Type),
  351:         Id
  352:     end, lists:seq(1, N)),
  353:     zipwith(fun(L, R) ->
  354:         lasp:bind_to(R, L)
  355:     end, Ids, Tail),
  356:     Ids.
  357: 
  358: zipwith(Fn, [X | Xs], [Y | Ys]) ->
  359:     [Fn(X, Y) | zipwith(Fn, Xs, Ys)];
  360: 
  361: zipwith(Fn, _, _) when is_function(Fn, 2) -> [].
  362: 
  363: sql_latency_test_case(Optimization, Iterations, From, To, Mutation) ->
  364:     case Optimization of
  365:         no_contraction ->
  366:             %% Disable automatic contraction
  367:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, false),
  368:             %% Force a full cleaving before starting the test
  369:             lasp_dependence_dag:cleave_all();
  370:         contraction ->
  371:             %% Enable automatic contraction
  372:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, true),
  373:             %% Force a contraction before starting the test
  374:             lasp_dependence_dag:contract()
  375:     end,
  376:     sql_run_case(Iterations, [], From, To, Mutation, undefined).
  377: 
  378: sql_run_case(0, Acc, _, _, _, _) -> lists:reverse(Acc);
  379: sql_run_case(Iterations, Acc, From, To, Row, Threshold0) ->
  380:     Threshold = {strict, Threshold0},
  381:     MutateAndRead = fun(F, T, R, Th) ->
  382:         lasp_sql_materialized_view:insert_row(F, R),
  383:         lasp:read(T, Th)
  384:     end,
  385:     {Time, {ok, {_, _, _, NewThreshold}}} = timer:tc(MutateAndRead, [From, To, Row, Threshold]),
  386:     sql_run_case(Iterations - 1, [Time | Acc], From, To, Row, NewThreshold).
  387: 
  388: write_csv(Dir, Option, Cases, Trim) ->
  389:     Path = code:priv_dir(lasp)
  390:            ++ "/evaluation/logs/"
  391:            ++ atom_to_list(Dir) ++ "/"
  392:            ++ atom_to_list(Option) ++ "/"
  393:            ++ integer_to_list(timestamp()) ++ "/",
  394:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(Path),
  395:     Trimmed = case Trim of
  396:         {trim, Start, End} -> lists:sublist(Cases, Start + 1, (length(Cases) - (Start + End)));
  397:         _ -> Cases
  398:     end,
  399:     lists:foreach(fun(Case) ->
  400:         file:write_file(Path ++ "runner.csv", io_lib:fwrite("~p\n", [Case]), [append])
  401:     end, Trimmed).
  402: 
  403: timestamp() ->
  404:     {Mega, Sec, _Micro} = erlang:timestamp(),
  405:     Mega * 1000000 + Sec.
  406: 
  407: %% @doc Increment counter and test stream behaviour.
  408: stream_test(_Config) ->
  409:     %% Declare a variable.
  410:     {ok, {C1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?COUNTER),
  411: 
  412:     %% Stream results.
  413:     Self = self(),
  414:     Function = fun(V) ->
  415:                        Self ! {ok, V}
  416:                end,
  417:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:stream(C1, Function)),
  418: 
  419:     %% Increment.
  420:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(C1, increment, a)),
  421: 
  422:     %% Wait for message.
  423:     receive
  424:         {ok, 1} ->
  425:             ok
  426:     after
  427:         300 ->
  428:             ct:fail(missing_first_message)
  429:     end,
  430: 
  431:     %% Increment again.
  432:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(C1, increment, b)),
  433: 
  434:     %% Wait for message.
  435:     receive
  436:         {ok, 2} ->
  437:             ok
  438:     after
  439:         300 ->
  440:             ct:fail(missing_second_message)
  441:     end.
  442: 
  443: %% @doc Test query functionality.
  444: query_test(_Config) ->
  445:     %% Declare a variable.
  446:     {ok, {I1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  447: 
  448:     %% Change it's value.
  449:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(I1, {set, 2}, a)),
  450: 
  451:     %% Threshold read just to create a synchronization point for the
  452:     %% value to change.
  453:     {ok, _} = lasp:read(I1, {strict, undefined}),
  454: 
  455:     %% Query it.
  456:     ?assertMatch({ok, 2}, lasp:query(I1)),
  457: 
  458:     ok.
  459: 
  460: 
  461: %% @doc Test transaction functionality.
  462: transaction_test(_Config) ->
  463:     
  464:     %% Create initial set.
  465:     {ok, {SourceId, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare({<<"source">>, state_orset}, state_orset),
  466:     %{ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  467:      %ok, {SourceId, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare({<<"source">>, state_orset}, state_orset).
  468:     ?assertMatch(ok,lasp:transaction([{SourceId, {add, 2}},{SourceId, {add, 1}}], self())),
  469:     %%  %% Apply .transaction.
  470:     %?assertMatch(ok, lasp:transaction([ SourceId, {add, 2 }], self())),
  471:      
  472:     %% Sleep.
  473:     %timer:sleep(400),
  474: 
  475:     %% Read union.
  476:     %{ok, {_, _, _, Transaction0}} = lasp:read(S1, undefined),
  477: 
  478:     %% Read union value.
  479:    % Transaction = lasp_type:query(?SET, Transaction0),
  480: 
  481:     %?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3])}, {ok, Transaction}),
  482: 
  483:     
  484:     
  485: 
  486:     ok.
  487: 
  488: 
  489: %% @doc Single-assignment variable test.
  490: ivar_test(_Config) ->
  491:     %% Single-assignment variables.
  492:     {ok, {I1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  493:     {ok, {I2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  494:     {ok, {I3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  495: 
  496:     V1 = 1,
  497: 
  498:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  499:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(I2, I1)),
  500:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(I1, {set, V1}, a)),
  501:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(I3, I1)),
  502: 
  503:     timer:sleep(4000),
  504: 
  505:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  506:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I3, {strict, undefined})),
  507:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I2, {strict, undefined})),
  508:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I1, {strict, undefined})),
  509: 
  510:     ok.
  511: 
  512: %% @doc Map operation test.
  513: map_test(_Config) ->
  514:     %% Create initial set.
  515:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  516: 
  517:     %% Add elements to initial set and update.
  518:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  519: 
  520:     %% Create second set.
  521:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  522: 
  523:     %% Apply map.
  524:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:map(S1, fun(X) -> X * 2 end, S2)),
  525: 
  526:     %% Wait.
  527:     timer:sleep(4000),
  528: 
  529:     %% Bind again.
  530:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [4,5,6]}, a)),
  531: 
  532:     %% Wait.
  533:     timer:sleep(4000),
  534: 
  535:     %% Read resulting value.
  536:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1V4}} = lasp:read(S1, {strict, undefined}),
  537: 
  538:     %% Read resulting value.
  539:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2V1}} = lasp:read(S2, {strict, undefined}),
  540: 
  541:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5,6]), sets:from_list([2,4,6,8,10,12])},
  542:                  {ok, lasp_type:query(?SET, S1V4), lasp_type:query(?SET, S2V1)}),
  543: 
  544:     ok.
  545: 
  546: %% @doc Filter operation test.
  547: filter_test(_Config) ->
  548:     %% Create initial set.
  549:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  550: 
  551:     %% Add elements to initial set and update.
  552:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  553: 
  554:     %% Create second set.
  555:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  556: 
  557:     %% Apply filter.
  558:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:filter(S1, fun(X) -> X rem 2 == 0 end, S2)),
  559: 
  560:     %% Wait.
  561:     timer:sleep(4000),
  562: 
  563:     %% Bind again.
  564:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [4,5,6]}, a)),
  565: 
  566:     %% Wait.
  567:     timer:sleep(4000),
  568: 
  569:     %% Read resulting value.
  570:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1V4}} = lasp:read(S1, {strict, undefined}),
  571: 
  572:     %% Read resulting value.
  573:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2V1}} = lasp:read(S2, {strict, undefined}),
  574: 
  575:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5,6]), sets:from_list([2,4,6])},
  576:                  {ok, lasp_type:query(?SET, S1V4), lasp_type:query(?SET, S2V1)}),
  577: 
  578:     ok.
  579: 
  580: %% @doc Union operation test.
  581: union_test(_Config) ->
  582:     %% Create initial sets.
  583:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  584:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  585: 
  586:     %% Create output set.
  587:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  588: 
  589:     %% Populate initial sets.
  590:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  591:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,c]}, a)),
  592: 
  593:     %% Apply union.
  594:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:union(S1, S2, S3)),
  595: 
  596:     %% Sleep.
  597:     timer:sleep(400),
  598: 
  599:     %% Read union.
  600:     {ok, {_, _, _, Union0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  601: 
  602:     %% Read union value.
  603:     Union = lasp_type:query(?SET, Union0),
  604: 
  605:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,a,b,c])}, {ok, Union}),
  606: 
  607:     ok.
  608: 
  609: %% @doc Intersection test.
  610: intersection_test(_Config) ->
  611:     %% Create initial sets.
  612:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  613:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  614: 
  615:     %% Create output set.
  616:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  617: 
  618:     %% Populate initial sets.
  619:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  620:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,3]}, a)),
  621: 
  622:     %% Apply intersection.
  623:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:intersection(S1, S2, S3)),
  624: 
  625:     %% Sleep.
  626:     timer:sleep(400),
  627: 
  628:     %% Read intersection.
  629:     {ok, {_, _, _, Intersection0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  630: 
  631:     %% Read intersection value.
  632:     Intersection = lasp_type:query(?SET, Intersection0),
  633: 
  634:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([3])}, {ok, Intersection}),
  635: 
  636:     ok.
  637: 
  638: %% @doc Cartesian product test.
  639: product_test(_Config) ->
  640:     %% Create initial sets.
  641:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  642:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  643: 
  644:     %% Create output set.
  645:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  646: 
  647:     %% Populate initial sets.
  648:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  649:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,3]}, a)),
  650: 
  651:     %% Apply product.
  652:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:product(S1, S2, S3)),
  653: 
  654:     %% Sleep.
  655:     timer:sleep(400),
  656: 
  657:     %% Read product.
  658:     {ok, {_, _, _, Product0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  659: 
  660:     %% Read product value.
  661:     Product = lasp_type:query(?SET, Product0),
  662: 
  663:     ?assertEqual({ok,sets:from_list([{1,3},{1,a},{1,b},{2,3},{2,a},{2,b},{3,3},{3,a},{3,b}])}, {ok, Product}),
  664: 
  665:     ok.
  666: 
  667: %% @doc Monotonic read.
  668: monotonic_read_test(_Config) ->
  669:     %% Create new set-based CRDT.
  670:     {ok, {SetId, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  671: 
  672:     %% Determine my pid.
  673:     Me = self(),
  674: 
  675:     %% Perform 4 binds, each an inflation.
  676:     ?assertMatch({ok, _},
  677:                  lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [1]}, actor)),
  678: 
  679:     {ok, {_, _, _, V0}} = lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [2]}, actor),
  680: 
  681:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, _}},
  682:                  lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [3]}, actor)),
  683: 
  684:     %% Spawn fun which should block until lattice is strict inflation of
  685:     %% V0.
  686:     I1 = first_read,
  687:     spawn(fun() -> Me ! {I1, lasp:read(SetId, {strict, V0})} end),
  688: 
  689:     %% Ensure we receive [1, 2, 3].
  690:     Set1 = receive
  691:         {I1, {ok, {_, _, _, X}}} ->
  692:             lasp_type:query(?SET, X)
  693:     end,
  694: 
  695:     %% Perform more inflations.
  696:     {ok, {_, _, _, V1}} = lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [4]}, actor),
  697: 
  698:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [5]}, actor)),
  699: 
  700:     %% Spawn fun which should block until lattice is a strict inflation
  701:     %% of V1.
  702:     I2 = second_read,
  703:     spawn(fun() -> Me ! {I2, lasp:read(SetId, {strict, V1})} end),
  704: 
  705:     %% Ensure we receive [1, 2, 3, 4].
  706:     Set2 = receive
  707:         {I2, {ok, {_, _, _, Y}}} ->
  708:             lasp_type:query(?SET, Y)
  709:     end,
  710: 
  711:     ?assertEqual({sets:from_list([1,2,3]), sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5])},
  712:                  {Set1, Set2}),
  713: 
  714:     ok.
  715: 
  716: %% @doc Dynamic variable test.
  717: dynamic_ivar_test(Config) ->
  718:     [Node1, Node2 | _Nodes] = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  719: 
  720:     %% Setup a dynamic variable.
  721:     {ok, {Id, _, _, Value}} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, declare_dynamic,
  722:                                        [?ID, ivar]),
  723: 
  724:     %% Now, the following action should be idempotent.
  725:     {ok, {Id, _, _, Value}} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, declare_dynamic,
  726:                                        [?ID, ivar]),
  727: 
  728:     %% Bind node 1's name to the value on node 1: this should not
  729:     %% trigger a broadcast message because the variable is dynamic.
  730:     ?assertMatch({ok, {Id, _, _, {_, Node1}}},
  731:                  rpc:call(Node1, lasp, bind, [{?ID, ivar}, {state_ivar, Node1}])),
  732: 
  733:     %% Bind node 2's name to the value on node 2: this should not
  734:     %% trigger a broadcast message because the variable is dynamic.
  735:     ?assertMatch({ok, {Id, _, _, {_, Node2}}},
  736:                  rpc:call(Node2, lasp, bind, [{?ID, ivar}, {state_ivar, Node2}])),
  737: 
  738:     %% Verify variable has the correct value.
  739:     {ok, Node1} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, query, [{?ID, ivar}]),
  740: 
  741:     %% Verify variable has the correct value.
  742:     {ok, Node2} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, query, [{?ID, ivar}]),
  743: 
  744:     ok.
  745: 
  746: %% @doc Test of the orset.
  747: orset_test(_Config) ->
  748:     {ok, {L1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  749:     {ok, {L2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  750:     {ok, {L3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  751: 
  752:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  753:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L2, L1)),
  754:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2}} = lasp:update(L1, {add, 1}, a),
  755:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L3, L1)),
  756: 
  757:     timer:sleep(4000),
  758: 
  759:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  760:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  761:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  762:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  763: 
  764:     Self = self(),
  765: 
  766:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  767:                   {ok, _} = lasp:wait_needed(L1, {strict, S1}),
  768:                   Self ! threshold_met
  769:                end),
  770: 
  771:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:bind(L1, S2)),
  772: 
  773:     timer:sleep(4000),
  774: 
  775:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  776:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L3}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  777:     ?assertEqual(S2L3, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L3)),
  778:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L2}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  779:     ?assertEqual(S2L2, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L2)),
  780:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  781:     ?assertEqual(S2L1, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L1)),
  782: 
  783:     %% Read at the S2 threshold level.
  784:     {ok, {_, _, _, _}} = lasp:read(L1, S2),
  785: 
  786:     %% Wait for wait_needed to unblock.
  787:     receive
  788:         threshold_met ->
  789:             ok
  790:     end,
  791: 
  792:     {ok, {L5, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  793:     {ok, {L6, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  794: 
  795:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  796:                 {ok, _} = lasp:read_any([{L5, {strict, undefined}}, {L6, {strict, undefined}}]),
  797:                 Self ! read_any
  798:         end),
  799: 
  800:     {ok, _} = lasp:update(L5, {add, 1}, a),
  801: 
  802:     receive
  803:         read_any ->
  804:             ok
  805:     end,
  806: 
  807:     ok.
  808: 
  809: %% @doc Enforce once test.
  810: enforce_once_test(Config) ->
  811:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  812:     lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  813: 
  814:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  815:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  816:     Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
  817: 
  818:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  819:     timer:sleep(10000),
  820: 
  821:     %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
  822:     Id = {<<"object">>, ?COUNTER_TYPE},
  823:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?COUNTER_TYPE]),
  824: 
  825:     %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
  826:     Self = self(),
  827:     Threshold = {value, 1},
  828: 
  829:     EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
  830:                          lager:info("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
  831:                          Self ! {ok, Threshold}
  832:                  end,
  833: 
  834:     lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
  835: 
  836:     case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
  837:         ok ->
  838:             lager:info("Invariant configured!");
  839:         Error ->
  840:             lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
  841:             ct:fail(failed)
  842:     end,
  843: 
  844:     %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
  845:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  846:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  847: 
  848:     lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
  849:     receive
  850:         {ok, Threshold} ->
  851:             ok
  852:     after
  853:         10000 ->
  854:             lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
  855:             ct:fail(failed)
  856:     end,
  857: 
  858:     lager:info("Finished enforce_once test."),
  859: 
  860:     ok.
  861: 
  862: %% @doc Membership test.
  863: membership_test(Config) ->
  864:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  865:     ct:pal("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  866: 
  867:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  868:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  869:     Sorted = lists:usort(Nodes),
  870: 
  871:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  872:     timer:sleep(10000),
  873: 
  874:     case Manager of
  875:         partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager ->
  876:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  877:                                 {ok, Active} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, active, []),
  878:                                 {ok, Passive} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, passive, []),
  879: 
  880:                                 case lists:usort([Name || {Name, _, _} <- sets:to_list(Active)]) of
  881:                                     Sorted ->
  882:                                         ok;
  883:                                     WrongActive ->
  884:                                         ct:fail("Incorrect nodes in active view on node ~p: ~p should be ~p!",
  885:                                                 [Node, WrongActive, Sorted])
  886:                                 end,
  887: 
  888:                                 case sets:to_list(Passive) of
  889:                                     [] ->
  890:                                         ok;
  891:                                     WrongPassive ->
  892:                                         ct:fail("Incorrect nodes in passive view: ~p!",
  893:                                                 [WrongPassive])
  894:                                 end
  895:                           end, Nodes);
  896:         partisan_default_peer_service_manager ->
  897:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  898:                                 {ok, Members} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, members, []),
  899:                                 lists:usort(Members) =:= lists:usort(Nodes)
  900:                           end, Nodes);
  901:         partisan_client_server_peer_service_manager ->
  902:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  903:                                 {ok, Members} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, members, []),
  904:                                 lists:usort(Members) =:= lists:usort(Nodes)
  905:                           end, Nodes)
  906:     end,
  907: 
  908:     ok.
  909: 
  910: %% @doc Test of the add-wins set.
  911: awset_ps_test(_Config) ->
  912:     {ok, {L1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  913:     {ok, {L2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  914:     {ok, {L3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  915: 
  916:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  917:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L2, L1)),
  918:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2}} = lasp:update(L1, {add, 1}, a),
  919:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L3, L1)),
  920: 
  921:     timer:sleep(4000),
  922: 
  923:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  924:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  925:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  926:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  927: 
  928:     Self = self(),
  929: 
  930:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  931:                   {ok, _} = lasp:wait_needed(L1, {strict, S1}),
  932:                   Self ! threshold_met
  933:                end),
  934: 
  935:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:bind(L1, S2)),
  936: 
  937:     timer:sleep(4000),
  938: 
  939:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  940:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L3}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  941:     ?assertEqual(S2L3, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L3)),
  942:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L2}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  943:     ?assertEqual(S2L2, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L2)),
  944:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  945:     ?assertEqual(S2L1, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L1)),
  946: 
  947:     %% Read at the S2 threshold level.
  948:     {ok, {_, _, _, _}} = lasp:read(L1, S2),
  949: 
  950:     %% Wait for wait_needed to unblock.
  951:     receive
  952:         threshold_met ->
  953:             ok
  954:     end,
  955: 
  956:     {ok, {L5, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  957:     {ok, {L6, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  958: 
  959:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  960:                 {ok, _} = lasp:read_any([{L5, {strict, undefined}}, {L6, {strict, undefined}}]),
  961:                 Self ! read_any
  962:         end),
  963: 
  964:     {ok, _} = lasp:update(L5, {add, 1}, a),
  965: 
  966:     receive
  967:         read_any ->
  968:             ok
  969:     end.
